description: The wonderful thing about our “night in” cocktail, the Chamomile Hot Toddy, is that you can use just about any liquor left in your cabinet. While whiskey, rum or brandy are super safe bets, the hot water in this toddy can bring out the floral and botanical notes of a quality gin, even tequila is an option if you’re feeling adventurous (or if it’s the only left after the holidays).
